hadiths.text: Asma’, daughter of Abu Bakr, told of a woman who said :Messenger of Allah! I have a fellow-wife; will it be wrong for me to boast of receiving from my husband what he does not give me? He replied: the one who boasts of receiving what he has not been given is like him who has put on two garments of falsehood

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْمُتَشَبِّعِ بِمَا لَمْ يُعْطَ
chapter.eng-name: One who boasts of having something that he has not been given
